attributes.action: Teach parenting skills to all children (male and female) in secondary school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As most children will become parents at some time I believe we need to teach children in secondary school how to prepare for children they will be bringing into the world.  Showing how to improve a child's upbringing and give an understanding of the responsibility that having a child will have on their own life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
